keyMoments.title: Robin Refuses to Join Big Emperor
keyMoments.description: Robin flatly refuses to participate in the Big Emperor docking maneuver, stating it is too embarrassing and that they should feel ashamed as humans.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Robin's boundaries and dignified personality, providing both comedy and character insight.

keyMoments.title: Robin Uses Cien Fleur: Big Tree
keyMoments.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms on Oars' right arm, creating a mass of hands that resembles a giant tree to restrain the giant zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's Devil Fruit versatility in restraining even giant opponents.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms in one area, creating a mass of hands that resembles a giant tree to restrain opponents.

keyMoments.title: Franky Initiates Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor
keyMoments.description: Franky initiates Tactics 15, attempting to combine the crew into a giant mecha-like formation with himself as the body.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's creative tactical thinking and his influence on the crew's battle strategies.
keyMoments.quote: Pirates Docking 6: Giant Robot Warrior Big Emperor!

keyMoments.title: Franky and Chopper Use Super Heavy Gong
keyMoments.description: Franky and Chopper coordinate an attack on Oars' jaw with their combined Super Heavy Gong technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's ability to coordinate with other crew members for powerful combination attacks.

abilities.description: A combination technique where crew members physically dock together to form a giant mecha-like warrior, with Franky as the main body.
Franky and Chopper coordinate a simultaneous attack to strike an opponent with tremendous combined force.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Uses Dai Gekken with Heavy Nunchaku
keyMoments.description: Zoro pierces his two swords into Franky's Heavy Nunchaku and delivers a devastating blow to Oars' left arm with his Dai Gekken technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's adaptability in using unconventional weapons and his willingness to collaborate creatively with crewmates.

abilities.description: Zoro pierces two of his swords into a heavy object (like Franky's nunchaku) and delivers a powerful strike with the combined weapon.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Launches Zoro with Armée de L'Air Power Shoot
keyMoments.description: Sanji uses his aerial launching technique to propel Zoro toward Oars at high speed, setting up Zoro's Dai Gekken attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Zoro-Sanji duo's ability to coordinate despite their rivalry, working together for powerful combination attacks.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Destroys Oars' Supporting Leg
keyMoments.description: Sanji delivers the final blow by kicking Oars' remaining supporting leg, causing the giant zombie to fall face-first to the ground.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's crucial role in finishing the coordinated attack sequence, delivering the decisive blow.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Tokuyo Abura Boshi
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires his Special Oil Star at Oars' right foot, coating it with slippery oil to make him lose balance.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's strategic support role, setting up the coordinated attack by weakening Oars' stance.

abilities.description: Special Oil Star - Usopp fires a projectile that releases slippery oil to make opponents lose their footing.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Participates in Big Emperor
keyMoments.description: Chopper serves as the head of the attempted Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor formation in his Brain Point form.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's enthusiasm for Franky's creative tactics and his willingness to try unconventional strategies.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Uses Super Heavy Gong with Franky
keyMoments.description: Chopper coordinates with Franky to attack Oars' jaw with their combined Super Heavy Gong technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's combat coordination with other crew members.

keyMoments.title: Nami Discovers Empty Treasure Vault
keyMoments.description: Nami searches Thriller Bark's treasure vault expecting riches but finds it completely emptied.
keyMoments.significance: Advances Nami's subplot regarding Thriller Bark's treasure and shows her treasure-hunting instincts.

keyMoments.title: Brook Searches Kitchen for Milk and Salt
keyMoments.description: Brook explores Thriller Bark's kitchen searching for milk to heal his bones and salt to use against zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Brook's role in future zombie purifications and shows his self-sufficient preparation.

keyMoments.title: Oars Uses Gomu Gomu no Shirimochi
keyMoments.description: Oars demonstrates his own unique technique, leaping into the air and attempting to crush the Straw Hats with his massive rear end.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Oars' creativity in creating his own techniques beyond what Luffy's shadow provides.

keyMoments.title: Oars Falls to Coordinated Attack
keyMoments.description: After the Straw Hats' coordinated assault on his limbs, Oars loses balance and falls face-first to the ground.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even overwhelming power can be defeated through teamwork and strategy.

abilities.description: Oars' unique technique where he leaps into the air and attempts to crush opponents with his massive rear end - a butt stomp attack.

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Bartholomew Kuma Appears on the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, mysteriously appears on the Thousand Sunny carrying a Bible, seeking Gecko Moria's location.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a major threat to the arc and foreshadows dangerous confrontations to come while the crew is preoccupied with Oars.

reveals.information: Kuma appears at Thriller Bark, specifically on the Thousand Sunny
